publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2378 Frances Curran: Solidarity with Glasgow Airport Firefightersâ€”That the Parliament extends its solidarity to the striking firefighters at Glasgow Airport whose main concern is to protect the lives of passengers using the terminal building at the airport and opposes the withdrawal of a fire appliance from the terminal building. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-2378 Solidarity with Glasgow Airport Firefighters (lodged on 4 February 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2378 Solidarity with Glasgow Airport Firefighters (lodged on 4 February 2005) Colin Fox*, Elaine Smith*

S2M-2378 Solidarity with Glasgow Airport Firefighters (lodged on 4 February 2005) Ms Sandra White*, Bill Butler*
